definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The heat generated in the compression phase is normally radiated into the air outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 压缩阶段产生热量一般被辐射到建筑物外的空气中。

sentences.english: Its quantity of heat and the far-infrared can rapidly penetrate the skin points deep place.
sentences.chinese: 其热量和远红外线能迅速穿透皮肤穴位深处。

sentences.english: People grow up aware of the value of counting calories.
sentences.chinese: 人们从小到大也非常注意计算食物的热量。

sentences.english: In summer days when the trees grow fast, temperature is relatively low and heat unadequate.
sentences.chinese: 而夏日林木生长旺季则气温较低，热量欠缺。

sentences.english: The group urges schools to stop selling full-calorie soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 协会还敦促学校停止出售富含热量的软饮料。

sentences.english: After this coal into the furnace to reduce the original furnace heat, impact efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 此煤入炉后降低炉内原有热量，影响效益。

sentences.english: Most low-fat yogurts are about 40 calories per 100g.
sentences.chinese: 大多数低脂酸奶每100克约含40卡热量。

sentences.english: "Water is a great strategy for dieters because it has no calories," says Madeline Fernstrom of the University of Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 水是节食者的伟大对策，因为它没有热量。

sentences.english: The unit of heat we shall use most frequently is the kilocalorie.
sentences.chinese: 我们最常用的热量单位是千卡。

sentences.english: So the real reason for concern may be that the calorific value produced by organic farming is insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 但是综合起来，平均土地产值以热量计应该是更高的。

sentences.english: Sugar-sweetened beverages were the leading source of liquid calories among study subjects.
sentences.chinese: 在研究对象之中，加糖饮料是液体热量的主要来源。

sentences.english: Why generate this kind of heat?
sentences.chinese: 为什么会产生这种巨大的热量？

sentences.english: So, heat is the problem, right?
sentences.chinese: 那么热量就是问题所在，对吗？

sentences.english: It's also extremely low in calories and delicious.
sentences.chinese: 而且也是低热量的美味。

sentences.english: In addition, the design method of hardware and software of micro energy lose heat meter are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了热量表微功耗软硬件设计思想及方法。

sentences.english: You got all the calories but little of the pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 你得到了所有的热量却一点都高兴不起来。

definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
